solsticeDesc: Ostara celebrates the coming of spring. This is a good time to plant seeds for future intentions, investments that will be realized come late spring and summer.

solsticeIdeas.text: Start taking action on ideas and goals
Make an egg salad and have a picnic

activities.text: Go see the cherry blossoms at the UW campus
Say hi to the ducks at the park
Visit the Locks and Discovery Park
Walk around the neighborhood looking for signs of spring

events.desc: Art market featuring local artists and artisans
Cultural festivals held throughout the year at Seattle Center
